tasks.title: Set up YOLOv8 damage detection model
tasks.description: Train/fine-tune YOLOv8 model for vehicle damage detection (dents, scratches, cracks)
tasks.dod: Model achieves >85% mAP on test set, API endpoint returns bounding boxes and confidence scores

tasks.title: Implement ResNet-50 damage classifier
tasks.description: Build damage severity classifier (minor/moderate/severe)
tasks.dod: Classifier achieves >90% accuracy, properly calibrated confidence scores

tasks.title: Convert models to CoreML for iOS
tasks.description: Export models to CoreML format for on-device inference
tasks.dod: Models run at >10 FPS on iPhone 12, <200MB memory footprint

tasks.title: Convert models to TensorFlow Lite for Android
tasks.description: Export models to TFLite format for Android
tasks.dod: Models run at >10 FPS on mid-range Android devices, <200MB memory

tasks.title: Integrate damage detection into mobile apps
tasks.description: Add camera capture, inference, and results display to iOS/Android apps
tasks.dod: Users can capture photo, see bounding boxes, get severity estimates in <3 seconds

tasks.title: Deploy damage detection API to Azure
tasks.description: Containerize and deploy API to AKS with GPU acceleration
tasks.dod: API handles 100 req/min, <2s latency, auto-scales

tasks.title: Implement ARKit LiDAR scanning
tasks.description: Build ARKit-based 3D scanning for vehicle damage
tasks.dod: iPhone 12 Pro+ users can scan vehicle, capture detailed mesh, export USDZ

tasks.title: Add mesh processing and volume calculation
tasks.description: Calculate damage volume from 3D mesh
tasks.dod: Accurately calculate volume of dents/deformations within 5% error

tasks.title: Integrate with damage report workflow
tasks.description: Attach 3D scans to damage reports and work orders
tasks.dod: 3D scans stored in Azure Blob, linked to reports, viewable in web app

tasks.title: Build web-based 3D viewer
tasks.description: Display 3D scans in browser using Three.js
tasks.dod: Users can view, rotate, measure 3D scans in browser with smooth 60fps

tasks.title: Set up Azure SignalR service
tasks.description: Provision SignalR for real-time dispatch comms
tasks.dod: SignalR hub handles 1000+ concurrent connections, <100ms latency

tasks.title: Implement push-to-talk WebRTC audio
tasks.description: Build PTT audio streaming with Opus codec
tasks.dod: Users can press/hold button, transmit audio, hear others with <200ms latency

tasks.title: Add AI transcription via Azure Speech
tasks.description: Transcribe radio transmissions in real-time
tasks.dod: Transcriptions appear live with >90% accuracy, stored for search

tasks.title: Build dispatch dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create live dispatch console with channels, users, transcriptions
tasks.dod: Dispatchers see all active channels, who's talking, full transcription history

tasks.title: Add incident tagging and emergency alerts
tasks.description: Tag transmissions with incident IDs, send emergency alerts
tasks.dod: Users can tag transmissions, emergency button sends instant alerts to all

tasks.title: Set up React Three Fiber environment
tasks.description: Configure R3F with PBR materials, lighting, shadows
tasks.dod: Photorealistic rendering at 60fps, supports 100k+ poly models

tasks.title: Load vehicle 3D models (GLB/USDZ)
tasks.description: Load and optimize vehicle models from various sources
tasks.dod: Models load in <2s, auto-optimized for web, maintain visual quality

tasks.title: Add interactive controls and AR mode
tasks.description: Orbit controls, annotations, AR Quick Look for iOS
tasks.dod: Smooth controls, clickable parts, one-tap AR on iOS

tasks.title: Build vehicle customization UI
tasks.description: Color picker, wheel selector, accessory toggles
tasks.dod: Users change colors/wheels/accessories, see updates instantly

tasks.title: Integrate with fleet vehicle catalog
tasks.description: Load real vehicle data, link to inventory
tasks.dod: 3D viewer displays real fleet vehicles with accurate specs

tasks.title: Set up Google OR-Tools solver
tasks.description: Configure OR-Tools for vehicle routing problem (VRP)
tasks.dod: Solver handles 100+ stops, 20+ vehicles, runs in <10s

tasks.title: Integrate Mapbox routing API
tasks.description: Get real road distances, traffic, turn-by-turn directions
tasks.dod: Routes use real roads, account for traffic, provide directions

tasks.title: Add EV range and charging constraints
tasks.description: Factor in EV battery range, charging station locations
tasks.dod: EVs never run out of charge, optimal charging stops added

tasks.title: Build route optimization dashboard
tasks.description: UI to input stops, visualize optimized routes, compare options
tasks.dod: Users input stops, see optimized routes on map, download directions

tasks.title: Add real-time route adjustments
tasks.description: Re-optimize routes when stops added/removed or delays occur
tasks.dod: Routes auto-update when changes occur, drivers notified instantly

tasks.title: Train Prophet forecasting models
tasks.description: Forecast component failures based on historical data
tasks.dod: Models predict failures 30+ days in advance with >75% accuracy

tasks.title: Build LSTM RUL estimation model
tasks.description: Estimate remaining useful life (RUL) for vehicle components
tasks.dod: RUL predictions within 10% error, updated as new data arrives

tasks.title: Implement anomaly detection
tasks.description: Detect unusual sensor patterns indicating imminent failure
tasks.dod: Anomalies detected within 1 hour, <5% false positive rate

tasks.title: Auto-generate work orders from predictions
tasks.description: Automatically create work orders when failure predicted
tasks.dod: Work orders created 2 weeks before predicted failure, assigned to technicians

tasks.title: Build predictive maintenance dashboard
tasks.description: Visualize RUL, failure probabilities, upcoming maintenance
tasks.dod: Fleet managers see all vehicles, predicted failures, proactive maintenance schedule

tasks.title: Integrate dashcam video streams
tasks.description: Connect to dashcam APIs, stream/store video
tasks.dod: Videos stream to Azure Blob, accessible via API, retained per policy

tasks.title: Implement distracted driving detection
tasks.description: Detect phone use, eating, drowsiness via Azure Computer Vision
tasks.dod: Distractions detected within 2s, alerts sent to fleet manager

tasks.title: Add collision detection and harsh event alerts
tasks.description: Detect hard braking, acceleration, cornering, collisions
tasks.dod: Harsh events detected, 30s video clips saved, alerts sent

tasks.title: Build evidence locker for video clips
tasks.description: Secure storage for incident videos, chain of custody
tasks.dod: Videos immutable, audit trail of access, exportable for legal purposes

tasks.title: Create driver safety dashboard
tasks.description: Driver scorecards, safety trends, coaching recommendations
tasks.dod: Managers see driver scores, trends, can review incidents, coach drivers

tasks.title: Implement OCPP 2.0.1 charging station protocol
tasks.description: Connect to charging stations via OCPP
tasks.dod: Connect to OCPP chargers, monitor status, start/stop charging remotely

tasks.title: Build smart charging scheduler
tasks.description: Optimize charging times based on electricity rates, vehicle schedules
tasks.dod: Vehicles charge during off-peak hours, ready for scheduled departures

tasks.title: Add charging station reservation system
tasks.description: Allow drivers to reserve charging spots
tasks.dod: Drivers reserve spots via app, no conflicts, reminders sent

tasks.title: Implement carbon tracking
tasks.description: Calculate carbon savings from EV usage vs. ICE vehicles
tasks.dod: Accurate carbon savings calculated, displayed on dashboard, exportable for ESG

tasks.title: Build EV fleet dashboard
tasks.description: Battery health, charge levels, range, charging history
tasks.dod: Managers see all EV status, battery health trends, plan charging

tasks.title: Implement offline-first architecture with SQLite
tasks.description: Store data locally, sync when online
tasks.dod: Apps work offline, sync automatically when online, no data loss

tasks.title: Add digital toolbox (forms, checklists, manuals)
tasks.description: Pre-trip inspections, safety checklists, repair manuals
tasks.dod: Drivers complete inspections offline, data syncs, PDFs cached

tasks.title: Integrate keyless entry via Smartcar API
tasks.description: Lock/unlock vehicles from app
tasks.dod: Authorized users lock/unlock vehicles via app, audit trail logged

tasks.title: Add push notifications and background sync
tasks.description: Work order assignments, maintenance alerts, message notifications
tasks.dod: Users receive timely notifications, background sync keeps data fresh

tasks.title: Optimize mobile performance
tasks.description: Reduce bundle size, improve startup time, smooth animations
tasks.dod: Apps start in <2s, 60fps animations, <50MB download size

tasks.title: Set up i18next for multi-language support
tasks.description: Configure i18n, extract strings, add language switcher
tasks.dod: Support English, Spanish, French initially, easy to add more languages

tasks.title: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
tasks.description: Keyboard navigation, screen reader support, color contrast
tasks.dod: Pass automated accessibility tests, manual screen reader testing successful

tasks.title: Add right-to-left (RTL) layout support
tasks.description: Support RTL languages like Arabic
tasks.dod: UI flips correctly for RTL languages, no layout breaks

tasks.title: Translate all UI strings
tasks.description: Professional translations for supported languages
tasks.dod: All strings translated, contextually accurate, reviewed by native speakers

tasks.title: Integrate WEX fuel card API
tasks.description: Import fuel transactions, reconcile with vehicles
tasks.dod: Fuel purchases auto-imported, matched to vehicles, cost tracking updated

tasks.title: Build SAP ERP connector
tasks.description: Sync fleet data with SAP (work orders, costs, inventory)
tasks.dod: Data syncs both ways, no duplicates, errors logged and alertable

tasks.title: Integrate toll transponder systems
tasks.description: Import toll transactions, allocate to vehicles/cost centers
tasks.dod: Toll charges auto-imported, allocated correctly, reports available

tasks.title: Build GraphQL API for third-party integrations
tasks.description: Flexible API for external systems to query/mutate fleet data
tasks.dod: GraphQL API supports common queries, documented in GraphiQL, rate-limited

tasks.title: Implement webhook system for event notifications
tasks.description: Send webhooks when events occur (maintenance due, alerts, etc.)
tasks.dod: External systems can subscribe to events, webhooks delivered reliably, retried on failure

integration_tasks.title: Integration Testing Across All Features
integration_tasks.description: End-to-end tests validating all features work together

integration_tasks.title: Deploy All Services to Production AKS
integration_tasks.description: Deploy all new services to Azure Kubernetes Service

integration_tasks.title: Update All Documentation
integration_tasks.description: API docs, user guides, deployment playbooks, architecture diagrams

integration_tasks.title: Security Audit All New Features
integration_tasks.description: Penetration testing, OWASP compliance, vulnerability scanning
